column1: Uchi////Food from out of this world! Never expected to find something this great in Houston
column2: on par if not better than places in London or New York. Â Must haves: uchi salad
column5: and the milk dessert. So sad to see the duck jar jar taken out of the menu
column6: had it three years ago on my last visit... None the less
column7: amazing food and atmosphere. A must on every visit to Houston
